title: Passion of the Vampire King
description: Might as well face it, I’m addicted to thrall.I thought I’d seen the last of Valentine… at least for a little while, but he’s found a way to get me back under his thrall. This time, I’m not resisting.But he’s the least of my problems. The deal I made with the devil has backfired.If I don’t get the better of this bargain, I’m at risk of spending the rest of my days in hell.Passion of the Vampire King is book five of the Blood Fire Saga.
author: Bella Klaus
